reporter_caption.center: GREAT ATLANTIC PACIFIC TEA CO. v. SMALLEY, 229 Ala. 289 (1934)

caption.center: GREAT ATLANTIC PACIFIC TEA CO. v. H. M. SMALLEY.

opinion.attorneys:
J. L. Drennen, of Birmingham, for petitioner.
Beddow, Ray Jones, of Birmingham, for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Petition of the Great Atlantic Pacific Tea Company for certiorari to the Court of Appeals to review and revise the judgment and decision of that Court in Great Atlantic Pacific Tea Co. v. H. M. Smalley, 156 So. 639.
Writ denied.
GARDNER, BOULDIN, and FOSTER, JJ., concur.Page 290
